title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
description: A dark and emotional action-adventure game set in plague-ridden medieval France.

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition
description: A classic real-time strategy game remastered with enhanced graphics and new content.

title: Alone in the Dark
description: One of the pioneering survival horror games that set the standard for the genre.

title: Among Us
description: A multiplayer game where crewmates try to complete tasks while impostors try to eliminate them.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Dawn of Ragnarök
description: Embark on a new journey as a Viking warrior in the latest installment of the Assassin's Creed series.

title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
description: Explore the beautiful yet dangerous world of Pandora in this action-adventure game based on James Cameron's Avatar universe.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3
description: Experience the thrilling conclusion to the Modern Warfare trilogy as you battle through intense missions across the globe.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the dystopian future of Night City in this highly anticipated open-world RPG.

title: Dead by Daylight
description: A multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a killer while the others try to escape.

title: Destiny 2: Die Finale
description: Continue your epic journey as a Guardian in the ultimate battle against the Darkness in this thrilling sequel.

title: Dragon's Dogma 2
description: Embark on an epic adventure in a vast open world filled with mythical creatures and ancient mysteries.

title: Elden Ring
description: Discover the secrets of the shattered world of Elden Ring in this highly anticipated action RPG.
